Text: Truly one of the worst movies ever made.  Don't bother!  It's not even so bad that it's funny: just abysmally pathetic.  Download the soundtrack album: that's the only saving grace.

OrpheusDude is off his fuckin rocker, this movie is supposed to be stupid, its a bond PARODY! its making fun of the whole sex addicted espionage thing. it is hilarious IF that is your type of humor, opinions are like assholes everyone has them and they all stink.
Ditto what Alli Kat said to Orpheus dude;  you are a moron with your head up your ass. This is one of the best movies ever made.
OrpheusDude: try watching the movie. It's not a serious take on Bond (though it is faithful to the Fleming novel), it's not even an Eon production.
